msg: Add Discardable interface, used by the threaded service model.

msg: Add Registry.shutdown(), RegistryShutdownListener and all related support.

msg: Create utility class EventListenerList, used for managing listeners lists (for services like ThreadEventNotifier).

msg: Fix relative URLs in xdocs for Maven 1.0-rc1 (which fixes a bug in xdoc XML parsing).

msg: Refactor the service extension point implementations into a single ServiceExtensionPointImpl and multiple implementations of the new ServiceModel interface.
